backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining CMS data types, admin authentication with token management, and CRUD state maps for sections, products, gallery, messages, and settings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in routing, auth, queries, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout with sidebar navigation and logout handling, wrapping admin pages inside a container with Outlet.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLogin.tsx: Renders the admin login form, handles credential submission, and displays login or session errors.
frontend/src/admin/AdminRoutes.tsx: Controls admin routing based on session token and actor state, validating tokens and handling backend errors.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminDelet: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with optional loading state.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminFormE: Displays a styled error alert for form-level errors.
frontend/src/admin/components/Initialize: Card that lets admins initialize sample site content with confirmation and loading states.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminAccount: React Query hooks for listing, adding, and deleting admin accounts with error normalization.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Provides admin login and logout mutations, handling token extraction and readable auth errors.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminContent: Defines mutations for creating, updating, and deleting sections and products, invalidating relevant queries.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminPasswor: Provides a React Query mutation for changing the admin password, including token validation and error normalization.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Manages admin session token and session error values using sessionStorage with helper setters and clearers.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminAccountsPa: UI for listing, creating, and deleting admin accounts with validation, mutations, and status handling.
Displays admin dashboard statistics sourced from various queries and shows quick navigation guidance.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminNotFound.t: Renders a styled 404 page for missing admin routes with a link back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/admin/pages/ChangePasswordP: Form for changing the admin password with client-side validation and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/admin/pages/ContactInfoEdit: Editor for updating business contact info with validation, mutations, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/admin/pages/GalleryEditor.t: Allows adding, editing, and deleting gallery items with form validation, mutations, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MessagesInbox.t: Displays and manages contact messages with loading, error, delete, and empty states.
CRUD interface for products including form validation, add/edit modes, and delete confirmation.
Provides UI for creating, editing, and deleting content sections with validation and state handling.
frontend/src/admin/pages/SiteSettingsEdi: Form for editing and saving basic site settings like name and logo URL.
frontend/src/admin/ProfileSetupModal.tsx: Modal for collecting and saving the user’s display name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/admin/utils/adminAuthErrorM: Maps replica rejection details to user-facing admin auth error messages and token-preservation logic.
frontend/src/admin/utils/option.ts: Utility for extracting string tokens from Motoko option-like values.
frontend/src/admin/utils/replicaRejectio: Parses errors to extract replica rejection details, detecting canister stoppage, connectivity issues, and unauthorized states.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router, query client, layouts, and all public and admin routes.
frontend/src/components/BackendUnavailab: Shows a server connectivity error message with retry and diagnostics links in compact or full layouts.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the site logo using settings data with a fallback image and error handler.
frontend/src/components/BuildVersionLabe: Renders the app's build version and a preview badge if in preview channel.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and message submission via API.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Provides responsive site navigation with links, branding, mobile drawer, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/PublicAppErrorBo: Error boundary that catches UI errors and shows a recovery UI with reload and home options.
frontend/src/components/QueryState.tsx: Contains reusable loading, error, empty, and skeleton UI components for data-fetching states.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with contact info, quick links, version label, and connectivity fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/StartupHealthGat: Gate component that waits for actor initialization and backend health before rendering children, showing loading or error states as needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Provides a health‑check query for the backend with timeout handling and exposes a simplified reachability status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Clears Internet Identity session and wipes all react‑query caches on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of data‑fetching and mutation hooks that call backend actor methods with timeouts and react‑query integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables defining light/dark theme colors and utilities.
frontend/src/layout/PublicLayout.tsx: Public layout wrapper with header, footer, and routed content slot.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, react‑query client, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Fetches and displays 'About'‑related sections with loading, error, and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Fetches and displays contact info with loading and connectivity error handling, and renders a contact form and business details.
frontend/src/pages/DiagnosticsPage.tsx: Shows backend connectivity and actor initialization status, retrieves stored errors, and provides tools to retry and reset diagnostics.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Loads and displays gallery items with modal previews, handles loading and connectivity errors, and falls back on missing images.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Loads site settings and content sections to render a hero and feature sections, with error handling and fallback images.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays products in a card grid with loading, error handling, and image fallbacks.
frontend/src/pages/PublicNotFound.tsx: Renders a simple 404 page with navigation options to return home or go back.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Generates a build version string from environment variables with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/connectivityDiagnosti: Provides functions to store, retrieve, and clear the last connectivity error using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/queryTimeout.ts: Provides a timeout wrapper for async queries and utilities to normalize and detect connectivity-related backend errors.
frontend/src/utils/releaseChannel.ts: Determines whether the app is in production or preview mode using env vars and URL patterns.
frontend/src/utils/routerBasePath.ts: Computes the router base path from build-time config or preview URL segments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, radius, shadows, and animations with plugin support.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, known issues, and fix requests for the CMS Admin Panel.
